title: Prosecution Attorney

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Prosecute someone at night denying them the right of privacy. If any Town member attempted to visit your target but failed for any reason, their visit will succeed. Any evil players visiting your target will hear loud legal jargon nearby.
- Prosecute someone during the day granting them the right to a quick and speedy trial. You will double the number of votes they have received so far today.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Do you like my Phoenix Wright cosplay?

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Lynch every criminal and evildoer. Objection.

desc:
Post 1926
*We lived. How's that for you? We're living.*
